column5: This is a very colorful electic house 15 minutes from Hobby Airport. 15 minutes From Downtown. 30 minutes If you take public transportation which the bus stop is across thw street. Quiet Garden Sanctuary or Party Beer and Grilling With Friends. Perfect Privacy For Either Mood. I recycle, resuse and repurposed most all the patio decor and art. Art Installations Are Welcome And Some Supplies Are Provided.
column8: Private East End Garden Patio Home
